snippet: The chairman of the Boston Public Library board of trustees is resigning in the wake of an uproar over valuable art that went missing.
abstract: Jeffrey Rudman will resign from board of the Boston Public Library, same day library president Amy Ryan is also resigning, amid uproar over disappearance of valuable artworks.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Boston Public Library board of trustees is resigning in the wake of an uproar over valuable art that went missing.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Misplaced Art Leads Second Library Official to Quit
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Misplaced Art Leads Second Library Official to Quit
